1387:3463: kena kāraṇena dīrgha kālaṃ hyetadāryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānāmiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ kaccidahaṃ tadvāgduścaritasya,
1387:3468: kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ tadanena tasminsamaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati|
1387:3478: iti tānyāpakāntāni śīlānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yāvatpravartate|
1387:3479: yacca kāyakarma yaścājīvaḥ tepi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ityucyante|
1387:3489: yaccatvāri smṛtyupasthānānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā[|
1387:3492: tadetatsarvvamabhisamasya āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaścārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ|
1387:3499: tatra yā ca samyaksamṛtiryaśca samyaksamādhisyaṃ śamathaḥ|
1387:3505: jñānamātrapratibaddhavastudarśanamārgaḥ jñānotpattimātreṇa kleśān prajahātyanena kāraṇena vākkarmāntājīvā bhāvanāmārge vyavasthāpitāḥ|
1387:3506: iti ya evameṣāmanayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ, paricayaḥ|
1387:3518: api ca pūrvvotpannasya mārgasya paścādutpanno mārgaḥ|
1387:3524: tadyathā nirvvastukānāṃ kleśānāmapāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇātpratipakṣotpādācca srota āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ|
1387:3531: yayā yamādita eva na prayutyata ityādita u[t]trāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ|
1387:3537: api svābhyāsāttasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati|
1387:3541: tasyāsya srota āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti|
1387:3548: iha pratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate||
1387:3550: tatpunaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca|
1387:3563: ayaṃ tveṣāṃ viśeṣo rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaścireṇādhigantā bhavati|
1387:3567: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṃgāni|
1387:3569: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvvāṇi tāni liṃgāni saṃvidyante|
1387:3573: tathā rāgādicaritānāṃ samaprāptāni bhavanti pratyayeṣu satsu na prajñāyante|
1387:3591: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayituṃ|
1387:3595: tatropapatro jāto bhavatyeḍamūko hastasaṃbādhikaḥ apratibalo bhavati|
1387:3603: adhimuktisaṃprayogāddhi tamāryā[a]śāṭhyatayā sucintita dharmārthasya niḥkāṃkṣanirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā saṃprayuktā|
1387:3604: asmāddharma vinayādasaṃhāryādadhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca|
1387:3610: vigatamāyāśāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ yayā ṛjuko bhavati|
1387:3630: tatra puṇyasabhāro yenāpyetarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ prādurābhavanti|
1387:3668: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati|
1387:3669: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni||
1387:3694: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ |
1387:3701: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ (mārgadeśikāḥ)|
1387:3703: aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya āsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai prayuktā,
1387:3710: tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ|
1387:3711: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ|
1387:3732: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati,
1387:3749: tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ|
1387:3785: api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate|
1387:3806: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati|
1387:3818: sātatikaḥ, kṛtaparicayaśca bhavatyevaṃ sa ārādhako bhavati|
1387:3848: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmmatāṃ samatikramitum||
1387:3865: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati|
1387:3867: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati|
1387:3868: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ|
1387:3874: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati|
1387:3909: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ||
1387:3930: samādhiśca balavānevama syārambhaḥ saphalo bhavatyebhistribhiḥ kāraṇairviphalo bhavati|
